attributes.action: Recognizing      P.T.S.D.  In N. Ireland Veterans
attributes.additional_details:
I want Governments to recognise  the Call of Duty that our Soldiers Endured during Active Service in N. Ireland.
Terrorists who were the Enemy are now  Politicians
and some are Millionaires.
Ex Soldiers who served in N. Ireland are suffering, some in silence some grateful to Charities like Combat Stress.
Is this another War that Politicians get to walk away from.
Bloody Sunday Inquiries Cost Millions.

 Ex Miners were paid remuneration,

Please Sign this Petition So that N.Ireland Veterans are Recognised
